title: Worlds of Maybe: Seven Stories of Science Fiction
description: Introduction; Sidewise in Time by Murray Leinster; Sail On! Sail On! by Phillip Jose Farmer; Slips Take Over by Miriam Allen deFord; All the Myriad Ways by Larry Niven; Living Space by Isaac Asimov; Translation Error by Robert Silverberg; Delenda Est by Poul Anderson
author: Robert Silverberg
